title: Escape Game-Based Orientation for Pharmacy Manager Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmaceutical theory and administrative task experience
context.additional_context: A competency development program for strengthening the roles of pharmaceutical managers/leaders within corporations

learning_goals: Learners can establish a collaborative system with peer administrators through LMS-based escape game missions
Learners can accurately understand corporate pharmaceutical policy documents with over 90% precision through digital device-based mission-solving
Learners can complete an annual pharmaceutical task schedule with 100% accuracy through group project submissions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
